channel.title: I need help hacking the games variables
channel.description:
Okay if you dont have actionscript knowledge your probably not gonna know what to do sooo... get lost and dont post posts that say hmm i dont know or it should be possible. kthx.
Well the neopets game uses a URL check and stuff at teh begining of games if you have a slow computer yo uwill see a green chip like think and neo*bios loading and it uses url check to check if its domain is neopets.com and well i dont know a way around it... ive tried to delete that but when i try to submit score it says i have exceeded the maxium posting count thingy but i know i havent its because the url check.... it says so after ive decompield it then i export it in the error box its telling me the url check has failed.
VB: I was wondering if i made a ie controls box thing that loads the neopets game and then change the variables in VB, because the flash box wont load because the url check...

Okay if you dont have actionscript knowledge your probably not gonna know what to do sooo… get lost and dont post posts that say hmm i dont know or it should be possible. kthx.

Well the neopets game uses a URL check and stuff at teh begining of games if you have a slow computer yo uwill see a green chip like think and neo*bios loading and it uses url check to check if its domain is neopets.com and well i dont know a way around it… ive tried to delete that but when i try to submit score it says i have exceeded the maxium posting count thingy but i know i havent its because the url check… it says so after ive decompield it then i export it in the error box its telling me the url check has failed.
